brass knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
brass knuckles.description: Adds bludgeoning damage to unarmed strikes

chain mittens.name: Chain Mittens
chain mittens.description: cannot cast spells but +1 DR. Medium Armor

gauntlets.name: Gauntlets
gauntlets.description: Penalty of -5 to Dex, but +1 DR.  Cannot cast spells.  Adds two bludgeoning damage to unarmed strikes

sabatons.name: Sabatons
sabatons.description: Boots that count as heavy armor. +1 DR, -5 ft movespeed.

spurred boots.name: Spurred boots
spurred boots.description: Bonus to your mount"s morale and movespeed

atlatl.name: Atlatl
atlatl.description: Double range and +1 damage with thrown weapons

bookbag.name: Bookbag
bookbag.description: Carry 6 of any item and up to 6 scrolls or books. Comes with a random scroll
bookbag.num_slots: Carry 6 of any item and up to 6 scrolls or books. Comes with a random scroll

hydration_pack.name: Hydration Pack
hydration_pack.description: Carry up to 6 of any item with 6 slots specifically for liquids
hydration_pack.num_slots: Carry up to 6 of any item with 6 slots specifically for liquids

belt.name: Belt
belt.description: Hold up to 3 items for quick access

fanny_pack.name: Fanny Pack
fanny_pack.description: Additional storage space on the belt, at the cost of style

bandolier.name: Bandolier
bandolier.description: Has 6 slots but can only hold ammunition (including throwables)

books.name: Books
books.description: Take time to read, but can give your character new familiarities(tags) with an int check

hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
hearthstone.description: Transforms into a shelter, allowing a user to gain a rest while out in the wilds

mirage_cloak.name: Mirage Cloak
mirage_cloak.description: Projects a 1 hp 0 DR copy of you, which enemies may target for attacks.

orphic_lute.name: Orphic Lute
orphic_lute.description: Animates objects, adding them the party for 1 minute

tempest bottle.name: Tempest bottle
tempest bottle.description: Summons a lightning storm when used

horse_whisper_collar.name: Horse Whisper Collar
horse_whisper_collar.description: Allows user to speak with animals
